name: Pathogen Purge - Tower Defense
description: an exhilarating tower defense game that takes players on an epic journey through the human body as they combat and eliminate hordes of invading germs and viruses. As a player, you assume the role of a Nanobot Guardian, tasked with defending the human host from these microscopic threats. You will need to strategically position and upgrade your defensive towers to stop the relentless onslaught of pathogens while exploring different organs and systems within the body.
